patterns: list of courses offered in svvv
what are the courses offered in your college?
what are the courses in svvv?
can you tell me the courses available in svvv?
can you tell me the branches available in svvv?
responses: Svvv offers B Sc in Physics, Chemistry, Biotechnology, Maths, Electronics, B A in English, Sociology, Political Science and Economics. B Tech with specialisations like Electrical Engineering, Electrical And Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics And Instrumentation Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Information Technology are offered here. Apart from this, SVVV offers Masters and Ph D courses.

patterns: what is the address of college
responses: svvv is located in Ujjain Road Gram Baroli, Indore, Madhya Pradesh

patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: In order to support out-station students, Shri Vaishnav Shekshanik and Parmarthik Trust has built separate hostels for boys and girls in the central part of Indore. Admissions in these hostels are on 'first come first serve basis'. In addition to the above, there is a private boys' hostel located opposite to the institute.
